review: Amazing place, with wonderful cocktails and wonderful service! Got delicious turkish dessert as farewell gift and we are very grateful for that :) very recommended!
name: Julieta Balasch

review: Music is so loud, neighbours and other local businesses are being disturbed non-stop. Please don't support the businesses that do not care about their community.
name: Nate Robert (Nathan)

review: Milkshake cocktail was very pure, cappuccino looked like a usual coffee with milk. Prices are European though.
name: Victoria Miroshnikova

review: I had lunch next door and they played "Happy"  on repeat the entire time. F' this place
name: T Vollmer

review: Really bad loud music without a care to other businesses or neighbors around. Staff don't care.
name: Phillipa Jane

review: Very nice cocktails and kind service!
name: Mar Garro

review: Wonderful place! The service is amazing and very attentive
name: Sofia Zaalishvili

review: Полный отстой. Кальян на грейпфруте ждали пол года! Принесли не раскуреный. Даже не спросили переделывать ли или нет. Угольки не поменяли. Вкуса не чувствуется. Дымности хватило на 30 минут. (300грн +) не помню точную цену. …
name: Eddie

review: (Translated by Google) In the center of Kevin, it is in a very central location for cold drinks as well as light snack toast varieties and hookah enjoyment. …
name: ASIM KAYAN

review: Очень плохо с едой и обслуживанием. Ушли в грузинский ресторан рядом - отличное место с нормальным персоналом. …
name: Anton Lebedev

review:

The rest of the flavors are multiplied …

review:
Вкусный чай и очень порядочный персонал
